snippet: The comedian Stephen Colbert and Cardinal Timothy Dolan of New York spoke at Fordham University, sharing how joy and humor infuse their spiritual lives.
abstract: Comedian Stephen Colbert and Cardinal Timothy Dolan of New York speak together at Fordham University, in an evening billed as an opportunity to hear two Catholic celebrities discuss how joy and humor infuse their spiritual lives.
lead_paragraph: The comedian Stephen Colbert and Cardinal Timothy Dolan of New York spoke at Fordham University, sharing how joy and humor infuse their spiritual lives.

headline.seo: Colbert and Dolan Open Up on Spirituality
headline.main: A Comedian and a Cardinal Open Up on Spirituality
headline.print_headline: Cardinal and Comedian Talk, and Joke, About Faith
